data.title: Mallie Jean Case Obituary 2024
data.meta_description: Mallie Case, age 63 of Bradford, passed away on Wednesday, May 29, 2024 at her home surrounded by her family.She was born on December 11, 1960 in New Castle, IN to the late Geor...
data.text:
Mallie Case, age 63 of Bradford, passed away on Wednesday, May 29, 2024 at her home surrounded by her family.

She was born on December 11, 1960 in New Castle, IN to the late George Clifton and Della Buchanan.

In addition to her parents, Mallie is preceded in death by her granddaughter, Makenzie Morrison; stepfather, James Buchanan, Sr.; sisters, Mary Brickler and Janie Plummer; brothers, Ralph and Randy Clifton.

Those left to cherish Mallie’s memory include her loving husband of 14 years, Robert “Louie” Case; daughters, Jamie (Jason) Miles and Kami (Michael) Morrison; stepchildren, Curtis Case, Dalton Case, Derek Case; 14 grandchildren; 3 great grandchildren; brother, George Clifton; and her best friend, Cindey Lou.

Mallie enjoyed her cats and dog very much. She loved spending time with her family, especially her grandchildren. Mallie had a passion for shopping and was known for being fashionably late.

A graveside service will be held at 11:00 AM on Friday, May 31, 2024 at Stelvideo Cemetery, on the corner of 121 and Arcanum Bears Mill Rd.
